snippet.title: Aeon of Sands – The Trail | Release Trailer | PC & MAC & Linux
snippet.description:
Aeon of Sands – The Trail is a retro low fantasy RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world, with first person, grid-based exploration, puzzles, real-time combat, and a fully illustrated, non-linear, choose your story adventure ( https://store.steampowered.com/app/907820/Aeon_of_Sands__The_Trail/ ).

Website: https://aeonofsands.com
Blog: https://blog.aeonofsands.com
Follow us:
* twitter: https://twitter.com/aeonofsands
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aeonofsands
